body.div:
Vulani Installation Thank you for choosing Vulani, your business services and edge networking platform, designed for ease of use and positioned towards the small to medium enterprise markets.
You will be required to provide information about this server's storage, networking, and support status. Please enter this information accurately during installation.
Vulani will replace any software or data currently on this system's storage. Please ensure you have backed up any important data or configuration before proceeding with the install.
If you have been supplied with a license key, please be ready to enter it at the next screen.
More information about Vulani can be found at www.vulani.net
